Text: Contract Per our phone conversation Reliant requests to continue its use of contract capacity for the period Terms of this arrangement will be the same as Decembers
Contract for September Cc Reliant request to continue use of this contracts capacity for the period September through September as agreed upon in our phone conversation this morning

Contract Forwarded by Craig G CarleyTTGHouInd on AM Craig G Carley To cc Matt C ouInd Thomas J ouInd AM Subject Contract For the month of September Reliant request to have MMbtu of this contracts capacity listed as being primary at the Panhandle Pool and MMbtu being primary receipt at the Central Pool with primary deliveries sill being the California border For the period October forward Reliant request all MMbtu of this contracts primary receipt revert back to the Central Pool
